name: com.meta.xr.sdk.voice.composer
description: This package provides support for Composer, a feature in Wit.ai for visually designing interactive conversations in a graph-based dialogue designer.

samples.description:
Single Character Demo: A very simple composer driven experience with a single character.
 Double Characters Demo: A complex composer driven experience with multiple characters & multiple composers. 
 Context Map Demo: A demo scene showing how to work with the Composer's Context Map
